title: Apple Channel Store Advisor, Jeddah
summary: The people here at Apple don’t just build products — we craft the kind of wonder that’s revolutionized entire industries. Join Apple, and help us leave the world better than we found it.
description: The ASC has the following responsibilities to fulfil as they relate to four key areas: Customer, In-store Merchandising, Staff Management, Apple Corporate/Manager
preferred_qualifications: Bachelor’s degree or equivalent experience preferred.
